headline: Why IBM Stock Is a Sensible Way to Gain Exposure to Quantum Computing
summary: Looking for a smart, sensible way to gain exposure to the tantalizing upside of quantum computing without getting burned? You may be surprised to hear that an old-school tech stock like IBM (IBM) fits the bill, but Big Blue has you covered. Indeed, I’m bullish on shares of IBM due to its experience in quantum computing technology, reasonable valuation, and history as a strong dividend stock. These factors combine to make it a sensible way for investors to gain exposure to the tantalizing upside
